mutants.code:
from collections import defaultdict

def compress_string_length(S: str) -> int:
    S = sorted(S)
    S = list(map(ord, S))
    ans = 1
    while len(S) > 0:
        mn = S[0]
        S.remove(mn)
        nxt = mn + 1
        succ = 1
        while True:
            if nxt in S:
                S.remove(nxt)
                succ += 1
                nxt += 1
            else:
                break
        ans += min(3, succ)
    return ans

from collections import defaultdict

def compress_string_length(S: str) -> int:
    S = sorted(S)
    S = list(map(ord, S))
    ans = 0
    while len(S) > 0:
        mn = S[0]
        S.remove(mn)
        nxt = mn + 1
        succ = 1
        while True:
            if nxt in S:
                S.remove(nxt)
                succ += 1
                nxt += -1
            else:
                break
        ans += min(3, succ)
    return ans
